parameters.name: updatedAt.$gt
parameters.description: Will return items updated strictly after given date. Date-time format: http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14

parameters.name: updatedAt.$lt
parameters.description: Will return items updated strictly before given date. Date-time format: http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14
